content: Features iTerm2 Documentation: Documentation For me, 2 features are very useful: imgcat: display one or more images inline Download and Upload: i. You can right-click on a filename (e.g., in the output of ls) and select Download with scp from hostname**, and iTerm2 will download the file for you. ii. If you drop a file (e.g., from Finder) into iTerm2 while holding the option key, iTerm2 will offer to upload the file via scp to the remote host into the directory you were in on the line you dropped the file on.
